pkgmetadata.longdescription: # MinicliExpose functions in the command line. Minimalist and pythonic.Supports annotations and async functions.## Requirements- Python >= 3.6## Install pip install minicli## DocumentationSee [https://minicli.readthedocs.org](https://minicli.readthedocs.org)## Run tests pip install -r requirements-dev.txt python setup.py develop py.test
